metadata.name: Potential Windows Defender Tampering Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects potential tampering with Windows Defender settings such as adding exclusion using wmic

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/namespace:\\root\\microsoft\\windows\\defender')))

output.summary: Detects potential tampering with Windows Defender settings such as adding exclusion using wmic
